QuestData.Title: Dress for the Slide, Not the Ride
QuestData.Description:
If Kua'fon is serious about flying, we're going to need to protect him.
Go get a berserker skull and some armor for it. Meet me down in Talanji's Rebuke and we'll get him dressed for success.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Berserker Skull and Lightweight Skyterror Barding.
